title: The Great Trump Card - Novel Updates
tags: Acting   Bodyguards   Male Protagonist   Overpowered Protagonist   Romantic Subplot   Slow Romance
author: Liang Bu Fan   梁不凡
description:
A mysterious super bodyguard got into conspiracy and troubles while on his mission.

However, he stuck to the justice in his heart, fighting the underworld boss, tyrannizing the blackhearted bully, killing world top class assassin, stomping various kinds of the prodigal child of the underworld while picking up and flirting with girls along the way…

There would be karma and justice between right and wrong.>
